scheme_name: PMMSY: Ice Plant/Cold Store of minimum 10-ton capacity Haryana
brief_description: The subsidy for 10-ton capacity ice plant/cold storage units under Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana (PMMSY) supports the establishment of ice plants or cold storage facilities with a minimum capacity of 10 tons to improve fish preservation and cold chain infrastructure in Haryana.
detailed_description: The Pradhan Mantri Matsya Sampada Yojana: Ice Plant/Cold Store of minimum 10-ton capacity, introduced by the Ministry Of Fisheries, Animal Husbandry & Dairying, Government of India, aims to provide the subsidy to support the establishment of ice plants or cold storage facilities with a minimum capacity of 10 tons to improve fish preservation and cold chain infrastructure in Haryana. This centrally sponsored scheme is jointly funded 50% by the Central Government and 50% by the State Government. Eligible beneficiaries must undertake to keep the unit operational, cover maintenance and post-construction costs, and ensure ice is supplied to fishers and fish farmers at affordable prices.
benefits: A 40% subsidy is available for the General Category. A 60% subsidy is offered for SC (Scheduled Caste) and Women beneficiaries.
eligibility_criteria: The applicant must be a resident of Haryana and possess a valid Parivar Pehchan Patra (PPP). The applicant must submit an undertaking in the DPR agreeing to bear all operational, maintenance, and post-construction costs. The applicant must ensure that the ice plant/cold storage remains continuously operational. The applicant must ensure that the ice produced is supplied to fishers and fish farmers at affordable prices. The applicant must either own the land or have it on a long-term registered lease of at least 10 years. The applicant must note that central assistance will be provided based on actual costs, within the overall ceiling limits specified under PMMSY sub-components. The applicant must understand that, upon approval, the subsidy will be disbursed as per the procedure laid out under PMMSY.

Login to Apply for the Scheme: Step 1: Visit the Official Portal: Antyodaya-SARAL Portal.  Step 2: The "Sign in here" option is available on the right side of the screen. Fill in the required credentials and click on the ‘Login' button. Step 3: In the opened window, click on "Scheme/Services list", and a list of schemes will appear on the screen. Step 4: Now, select the scheme and click on "Apply for Service/Scheme". Step 5: Fill in all the details in the online application form and click on "Submit". documents_required: Date of Birth Certificate (Voter ID/Birth Certificate/Aadhaar/Matriculation Certificate) Caste Certificate from First Class Magistrate (Tehsildar/SDM) Agreement Deed between beneficiary and Fisheries Department Training Certificate related to the operation/maintenance of cold storage Land Record from Tehsil (Jamabandi, Nakal Akshizra, Fard, Registered Patta Nama) with clear title and latest records GST Bills Photographs of Cold Storage with beneficiary Detail of Bank Account and PAN Card Detailed Project Report (DPR) or Self-Contained Proposal (SCP) as per PMMSY guidelines All bills above ₹50,000/- as per E-way/Income Tax/GST rules Certificate from C.A. with the bills certifying payment compliance with Income Tax/GST rules CLU/NOC/Pollution/Fire Certificate from concerned department NOC from Gram Sabha/Municipal Corporation/Authority of the area where the unit is located Clear Site Plan/Area Site Plan attached with subsidy case All documents should be in readable form
